posts.name: Elaine
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.78 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • We fixed a bug that caused the camera to appear blank when attempting to link a new device. Now the viewfinder will only look like that if you’re trying to link a new device in a really dark room.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked:
joy!! delight!! some stickers that previously didn’t animate in Signal iOS are now animated!!! thanks :D

even pack icons

New Version: 7.78.0.1035-beta

72 new commits since 7.77.0.1026-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.78 [1]

  • Don't back up attachments exceeding 100MB [2]

  • Use SDWebIMageWebPCoder for backup thumbnail generation. [3]

  • Migrate deviceIds away from NSKeyedArchiver [4]

  • Handle receiving poll terminate [5]

  • EVEN LESS REST [6]

  • Migrate from YYImage to SDWebImage [7]

  • Clean up SendPaymentViewController. [8]

  • Use 'primary fill' as background color for selected row in lists. [9]

  • Clean up use of separatorColor. […] [10]

  • Remove Back Up Now/Later options after enabling Backups [11]

  • String tweak: You can use your phone -> Signal [12]

  • Fix sporadic CAPTCHA failures [13]

  • Remove owsFailDebug for plausible errors [14]

  • Rework Backup Settings progress bars [15]

  • Disable vertical scrolling in emoji category strip in reaction emoji picker. [16]

  • Make log lines more concise [17]

  • Improvements to Backups logging [18]

  • Make TSAttachment migration unskippable during app launch [19]

  • More permissively allow people to attempt database recovery [20]

  • Rotate link'n'sync capability [21]

  • Add .owsByteCount SwiftUI FormatStyle [22]

  • Add support for poll voting [23]

  • Update call join request hit test logic [24]

  • View Votes button with details view [25]

  • Update double tap icon tint [26]

  • Additional logs for black Linked Device camera [27]

  • Allow manually wiping the shared app container if DB unrecoverably corrupted [28]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.80.3 [29]

  • Updated undefined delivery configuration. [30]

  • Notifications for when a poll is ended [31]

  • Add prefix to poll preview & notifications [32]

  • Remove unused TimeElapsedChallenge [33]

  • Remove a few unused files [34]

  • Add liquid glass effect to ConversationScrollButton. [35]

  • Adjust PIN reminder cadence [36]

  • Speculative fix for black camera in Linked Device Screen [37]

  • Move around some files in SignalServiceKit [38]

  • Move protobuf/ into Protos/ [39]

  • Clean up sync transcript format [40]

  • Update comments regarding group changes [41]

  • Remove unused code for invalid invites [42]

  • Fix error handling when accepting group invitation [43]

  • Tweaks to reconcileBadgeStates [44]

  • Disable Backups as part of the "Create New Key" flow [45]

  • Temporary fix for broken layout in attachment and sticker keyboards. […] [46]

  • Add "liquid glass" effect to sticky date headers in chat. [47]

  • Fix header and footer height calculations [48]

  • Add liquid glass to attachment picker in chat. […] [49]

  • Add separate properties for upload/download limits [50]

  • Clean up logs [51]

  • Pop, don't dismiss, when tapping Not Now in Backups onboarding [52]

  • Remove displayBadgesOnProfileCache [53]

  • Don’t use UAKs with PNIs [54]

  • End calls when peeking after we’ve left the group [55]

  • Clarify ACIs vs. PNIs when fetching profiles [56]

  • Clean up a debugging warning [57]

  • Require ACIs for UAKs [58]

  • Remove redundant registration check [59]

  • Reupload profile avatar when re-registering [60]

  • Remove .formSheet from HeroSheetViewControllers [61]

  • Avoid redundant group fetches where unnecessary [62]

  • Build messages for devices we just learned about [63]

  • Bouncing input text bar [64]

  • Use solid color for "selected" background color of UITableViewCell. […] [65]

  • Avoid inefficient sorting when diffing group models [66]

  • Update styling of buttons in conversation settings header and similar screens. […] [67]

  • Fix unexpected highlighted area under "scroll down" button in chat on iOS 26. […] [68]

  • Update release notes [69]

  • Update translations [70]

  • Revert "Fix Xcode 26 builds on CI" [71]

  • Revert "Switch to Xcode 26.0" [72]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.77.0.1026-beta…7.78.0.1035-beta

Localization changes

No localization changes fit in character limit. You can view the full comparison to 7.77.0.1026-beta so far here. Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

posts.name: Delamcode
posts.cooked:
image894×998 211 KB

Posting this here instead of GitHub since it’s kinda niche; the failing to send image bug is happening with this image for me when copying from the Immich share menu. Not sure why, could be Immich’s fault, but it shares fine both here and in Viber…

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked:
probably not beta specific, but

for an old call link (created in 2024), go to the lobby to join > info icon > edit name > enter a name > neither Cancel nor Save button works. Save loads a bit and then nothing. can’t exit this screen without restarting app

probably expected that it’s not editable, but should say so ^^

was able to delete the link from the calls tab list, tho

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.78.0/dd68fdb37e9aae4a8584a5a17e0698732bbfe77160547c22f7dbcd335fdbfda7.zip

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.79 release.
